relation: configure terminal Example: Router# configure terminal
controller e3 slot/port Example: Router(config)# controller e3 1/1
loopback {local | network {line | payload} } Example: Router(config-controller)# loopback local
no loopback Example: Router(config-controller)# no loopback
Enables privileged EXEC mode. Enter your password if prompted.
Enters controller configuration mode for the specified slot/port.

Loops the E3 line toward the line and back toward the router. Keywords are as follows: local-- Loops the data back toward the router and sends an AIS signal out toward the network. network line payload -- Sets loopback toward the network before going through the framer (line) or after going through the framer (payload).
pageTitle: ISDN Voice Configuration Guide, Cisco IOS Release 12.4T - Clear Channel T3 E3 with Integrated CSU DSU [Cisco IOS Software Releases 12.4 T] - Cisco
